revised_title: The Creation of Electron Pairs by High-Energy Charged Particles
tldr: The authors discuss the creation of electron pairs by fast charged particles, focusing on the process of pair creation due to the interaction of the particles with the electron of the created pair. They present a method to calculate the probability of this transition and the effective cross-section for pair creation, considering the effect of screening and the dependence on impact parameter. This work contributes to the understanding of particle interactions and the development of particle accelerators.
